title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 302-1.5 - Oath required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 302-1.5 - Oath required

State Regulations

An applicant shall be required to take the oath or
affirmation in form prescribed by the board before the issuance of a license or
renewal thereof, and filed with the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
302-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
